conbody.p: A blog is defined as a personal website consisting of short, informal entries.
Many blogs can be personal in nature, although a great deal of them typically revolve around a certain topic such as politics, music, sports, and entertainment.

A blog usually combines text and images, links to other websites, and media which is related to the general topic. While they're considered to be primarily textual in nature, some blogs have very little textual accompaniment and are dedicated entirely to fields such as art, photography, videos, MP3's, and podcasts.
